metadata.author: Generated for franchise training
metadata.notes: Use this JSON as a canonical knowledgebase for staff training and chatbot content. Update promotions, warranty and inventory regularly.

company.name: Ban Hin Bee Sdn Bhd (BHB)
company.overview: BHB (Ban Hin Bee) is a trusted electrical & home appliances retailer operating physical stores and e-commerce in Malaysia. BHB carries major appliance brands and provides sales, installation and after-sales support.
key_differentiators: Wide brand portfolio (Panasonic, LG, Samsung, Haier, etc.)

customer_service.greeting: Greet every customer warmly. Example: 'Good day — welcome to BHB. My name is {agent_name}. How may I assist you?'
needs_assessment: Ask open-ended questions to understand customer needs.
Capture key details such as budget, brand preference, and installation requirements.
product_recommendation: Match customer needs to product features and price range.
Present 2-3 options with pros and cons.
quoting_delivery: Provide a clear quote including delivery and installation costs.
complaints_returns: Follow BHB’s official return/refund policy (3 days notification for wrong/damaged items).

question_variants: Tell me about Ban Hin Bee
faqs.answer: BHB stands for Ban Hin Bee, a trusted electrical store since 1961 in Malaysia.
Notify within 3 calendar days of delivery for wrong or damaged items. Item must be unused and in original packaging.
